ygData.subject: enhancing visuals?
ygData.msgSnippet: HAHA!  So...you no like da lump eh?  :)  Yeah, it does look pretty dumb huh?...I was pretty disappointed the first time I saw that thing.  Much cooler to carry
ygData.messageBody:
HAHA! So...you no like da lump eh? :) Yeah, it does look pretty dumb
huh?...I was pretty disappointed the first time I saw that thing. Much
cooler to carry one of those totem or idol things because it looks so much
neater.

Yeah, it would be nice of them to give us something to "wow" ourselves
over...especially since we have to wear these bath robes almost our entire
lives. It's real fun to collect cool things to wear for other classes. Not
much for us....even that Observer robes look kinda...err....soft (if you
know what I mean? ;) . Wouldn't it be neat to have *one* unique item,
weapon, or robes that each class would have? (ie. like the special sword
the Paladins get?)

-- Lim'Dul

>Sounds good, just add my little comment about the Skull of Jhen'Tra.
>Wizard look stupid in those robes anyway, so at least let us have a >cool
>skull in our hand to impress our big weapon, shiny armor wielding
>friends. It's not like there aren't any skulls in the game. I mean,
>there are dozens of different undead skeleton types. But still we are
>screwed over. When I hold the skull now, it looks like I have a lump >on
>my wrist. They just use the usual bag placeholder object, but a >little
>enlarged.
